text: In the CPBL, players born outside of Taiwan are often known as international players. This list includes all international players who are currently on CPBL extended rosters and thus eligible to play in the CPBL or in the CPBL 2. As the league has a limit on foreign players in each organisation (maximum of four foreign players at any given time), there are currently just 15 active players on CPBL extended rosters, all of whom are pitchers. This does not include Taiwanese players who were born abroad.
